lines.text: Money isn't everything, Jett.
Not when you've got it.
Why, Luz, everybody in
[this]
county knows you'd rather herd cattle than make love.
Well, there's one thing you got to say for cattle... boy, you put your brand on one of them, you're gonna know where it's at!
[last lines]
You want to know something, Leslie? If I live to be ninety, I will never figure you out.
I don't know what it might just be a good idea... to gamble 'long with ol' Madama.
How do you mean?
Jus' gamble 'long. Just... keep what she give me.
[beat]
I'm sentimental too, Bick.

Everybody thought I had a duster. Y'all thought ol' Spindletop Burke and Burnett was all the oil there was, didn't ya? Well, I'm here to tell you that it ain't, boy! It's here, and there ain't a dang thing you gonna do about it! My well came in big, so big, Bick and there's more down there and there's bigger wells. I'm rich, Bick. I'm a rich 'un. I'm a rich boy. Me, I'm gonna have more money than you ever *thought* you could have - you and all the rest of you stinkin' sons of... Benedicts!
Leslie... don't behave like that... making a fuss o'er those people. You're a Texan now.
Is that a state of mind? I'm still myself...
You're my wife now honey, you're a Benedict.
I still have a mind of my own. Elsewhere being gracious is acceptable.
Uh, well, but... we're gracious.

[to Jett Rink]
You insulted my wife, and you're gonna answer for it!
You all think that the glory happened here in the East, don't you, with Valley Forge and Bunker Hill? Do you know about San Jacinto? Have you heard about the Alamo?
You sure do look pretty, Miss Leslie. Pert nigh good enough to eat!
Bick, you shoulda shot that fella a long time ago. Now he's too rich to kill.
Just remember, one of these days, that bourbon's gonna kill you.
Okay, it'll be me or it. One of us has gotta go.

[Mounted on War Winds]
Suppose you came out here to show me how to run things to. Well let's go!
[She grits her teeth and slaps her sharp spurs into War Winds flanks as hard as she can to enrage the stallion]
I said I was sorry about the name calling it was very impolite I know. But in principle I was absolutely right

You come down here and tell us how to run things, insulting my friends and everything.Now, you look here Leslie, your my wife,Ms. I'm asking you right now when you are gonna settle down and behave like everybody else
Never
Who in Hohenzollern do you think you are anyhow, Joan of Arc or something
